description: This file defines an interface IUserSettings with nested IUserSettings::INotification for user preference settings management within the WPEFramework. It includes method declarations for setting and getting user preferences such as audio description, language options, captions, and privacy mode, as well as registration for notifications.

classes.name: IUserSettings
classes.description: Interface for user setting management in WPEFramework, providing methods to configure and retrieve user preferences, and manage notifications.

classes.name: IUserSettings::INotification
classes.description: Notification interface for listening to changes in user settings such as audio description, languages, captions, and privacy mode.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification handler to listen for user setting changes.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification handler.

methods.name: SetAudioDescription
methods.description: Enables or disables audio description feature.

methods.name: GetAudioDescription
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of audio description setting.

methods.name: SetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Sets the prioritized list of preferred audio languages.

methods.name: GetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Gets the current preferred audio languages.

methods.name: SetPresentationLanguage
methods.description: Sets the presentation language in BCP 47 format.

methods.name: GetPreferredCaptionsLanguages
methods.description: Gets the current preferred captions languages.

methods.name: SetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Sets the preferred closed captioning service.

methods.name: GetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Retrieves the current preferred closed captioning service.

methods.name: SetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Sets the privacy mode (e.g., share or do not share).

methods.name: GetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Gets the current privacy mode setting.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
